channel.title: Grand exchange
channel.description:
Read first: I dont wanna have like real runescape soo dont say its almost impossible for a 317 to make a real GE thank you!
Ok this is what i want, I wanna create a command like ::gesell ITEMID PRICE soo if i do that a yell message comes up with example C4ll3r just putted a BGS on GE for 50m And if you do ::gebuy a interface comes up with the items what is then in the ge and if you click on it you buy it for 50m a message comes up C4ll3r has just buyed a BGS on GE for 50m!, and if you do ::collect the amount of money comes in your invent.
The only problem is i dont have a idea how to start coding this :S Can someone help me with this

item.title: Grand exchange
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Read first: I dont wanna have like real runescape soo dont say its almost impossible for a 317 to make a real GE thank you!

Ok this is what i want, I wanna create a command like ::gesell ITEMID PRICE soo if i do that a yell message comes up with example C4ll3r just putted a BGS on GE for 50m
And if you do ::gebuy a interface comes up with the items what is then in the ge and if you click on it you buy it for 50m a message comes up C4ll3r has just buyed a BGS on GE for 50m!,
and if you do ::collect the amount of money comes in your invent.

The only problem is i dont have a idea how to start coding this :S
Can someone help me with this
